game_root - Static variable in class general.GameMain
 
GameMain - Class in general
 
GameMain() - Constructor for class general.GameMain
 
general - package general
 
generateMap(int, int, int) - Static method in class map_generation.ProceduralMap
Generates a level represented as a 2d Tile array of approximately the dimensions given

NOTE:
This method will not retrun a Tile array of the exact specified dimensions, and it should not be expected to.
getDriftPrevention() - Static method in class input.InputHandler
 
getMaterial(String) - Static method in class general.MeshManager

getMouseDX() - Static method in class input.InputHandler

getPath(PathNode[][], PathNode, PathNode) - Static method in class pathfinding.Pathfinding
 
getRegion() - Method in class map_generation.Tile
 
getTileSize() - Static method in class map_generation.Tile
returns the type 0-6 of the tile where 0 is a wall tile and 1-6 are colors of floor tile: r,o,y,g,b,v respectively
getType() - Method in class map_generation.Tile
Gets the type of the tile.
getTypeInt() - Method in class map_generation.Tile
returns an integer representation of this tiles TileType where the integers correspond as follows:
0 - wall
1 - region1
2 - region2
3 - region3
4 - region4
5 - exit
